Workflow.Name: UploadFile
Workflow.Description: Create one or more actions to happen when a button or link in Power Apps is selected. To use this flow from a Power App, select the control you want to trigger the flow and go to the Action tab in the Power Apps ribbon and select Flows.

Description.description: Create one or more actions to happen when a button or link in Power Apps is selected. To use this flow from a Power App, select the control you want to trigger the flow and go to the Action tab in the Power Apps ribbon and select Flows.
